userboard-desc: 允许发送跨板交流信息
boardblaststep1: 第一步 - 写下您要发送的信息
boardblastprivatenote: 所有信息将会作为私密信息发送
boardblaststep2: 第二部 - 选择您要发送信息的对象
boardnofriends: You have no friends to send a message to!
userboard_noexist: 您尝试查看的用户不存在
userboard_otherboardwith: $1 和 $2 之前的跨板交流
userboard_confirmdelete: 您确定要删除这条信息?
userboard_loggedout: 你必须要 [[Special:UserLogin|登录]] 才能向其他用户张贴信息
userboard_showingmessages: 当前显示 $1 条信息中的第 {{PLURAL:$4|$3|$2-$3}} 条
message_received_body_html:
Hi $1.

$2 just wrote on your board on {{SITENAME}}!

Click below to check out your board!

[[Special:UserBoard]]

---

Hey, want to stop getting emails from us?

Click [[Special:UpdateProfile]]
and change your settings to disable email notifications.
message_received_body:
Hi $1.

$2 just wrote on your board on {{SITENAME}}!

Click below to check out your board!

$3

---

Hey, want to stop getting emails from us?

Click $4
and change your settings to disable email notifications.
echo-pref-tooltip-social-msg: Notify me when someone leaves a message on my user board.
notification-social-msg-send:
$1 在您的留言板上留下了一条信息

''$2''
notification-social-msg-send-bundle: {{PLURAL:$1|One message|$1 messages|100=99+ messages}} have been left on your user board.
apihelp-socialprofile-send-message-descr: Send a message to a user's UserBoard.
apihelp-socialprofile-send-message-summa: Send a message to a user's UserBoard.
apihelp-socialprofile-send-message-param: A urlencoded version of the message to send.
Message type: 0 for a public message, 1 for a private message.
apihelp-socialprofile-delete-message-des: 删除一条用户留言板信息
apihelp-socialprofile-delete-message-sum: 删除一条用户留言板信息
apihelp-socialprofile-delete-message-par: Unique identifier of the board message to delete.
